name: John L. Scott Real Estate | Bellingham

google_reviews.author: savannah demery
google_reviews.review: Mira is so much more than a realtor to us. We moved from the east side of the state and wanted to make sure that this move was into a home, not just a house. Mira was recommended to us by our realtor Jessica Griffiths-Granly. Jessica had seen us through two sales and a purchase so we trusted her to find us the perfect person to help with our buy in Whatcom county. I never would have imagined how perfect of a person she found. Mira talked with us before we even started looking at houses to get to know who we were and exactly what we wanted and needed. The work she put in was above and beyond. She genuinely cared from minute one! While battling health issues I was so nervous about everything that a move meant, but Mira was my superhero! She did the legwork and found us amazing options to look through and set us up with everything we needed to make a decision. We wanted more than a house. We wanted community, activities, a place where our children could grow up and we could live in peace without losing our connection with the world. We narrowed our list thanks to Miras hard work and video tours that showed us more than the walls and floors but the feel of each home. Because she took the time to get to know us she was able to show us what would work in each home and what she thought wouldnt. We drove up one weekend and toured 14 homes in one day! With a 4 year old and 13 year old in tow that can be difficult but Mira made it so easy! She kept the kids interested with the aspects of each place meant for them and even answered all the questions my curious 4 year old threw at her without skipping a beat with us. We ended up finding the perfect home for us, in the most beautiful neighborhood, with everything we had hoped for! We figured we might have to settle on some of our wants but Mira found us the exact home and community we wanted to be apart of. She even did a tour of a park nearby that my kids fell in love with!! Mira kept on working every step of the way. She even coordinated with our home sale realtor to make sure everything flowed despite some issues from the sale of our previous home. When we signed and closed Mira didnt just shake our hand and move on. She made sure everything was setup! When we found out the gas had been turned off she was kind enough to bring us a heater to make sure we werent cold until things got figured out! Everyday we have spent in our new home has been beautiful and joyous and the community is so much more than we even hoped for! Mira is so much more than a realtor to us, she helped bring us home. We are forever grateful for everything she did, which I cant even write in its entirety. If you want a home you want Mira Gregory on your team!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Savannah, thank you for the amazing review about Mira! Congrats on  your new home as well.

google_reviews.author: Roger Hanson
google_reviews.review:
Most everyone will agree that there is more than enough stress and uncertainty when selling a home, and you truly need a helping and trusted hand guiding you through it from the beginning to the very end.  It makes all the difference in the world when you have that in a good and solid realtor you can trust.  We were fortunate to have Peter Roberts from John L. Scott to help us through the daunting task of selling our family home.

Peter has many years of doing this. In that time he has experienced all manner of what a seller will find as they work through the process. He took the time to explain the important details of the sale, and what to honestly expect at every turn. He helped us understand what was happening at every step of selling our family home.

We always felt like we were working with a good friend as well as a competent realtor. I know youll find him as effective and helpful as we have. Peter is highly recommended by our family.

google_reviews.author: Brenda Schoolfield
google_reviews.review:
When it comes to finding a dream  vacation home, the journey is almost as important as the destination. Lee and Mira made the process of real estate shopping enjoyable and fun. From our very first meeting, both these ladies worked hard to understand my vision, needs, and budget. Their patience never waivered as we looked at property after property. Lee's and Mira's first hand knowledge of the area, combined with a wide network and a commitment to client satisfaction, made all the difference.

For anyone looking for a property in Birch Bay or the surrounding areas, I can't recommend Lee and Mira highly enough. With these ladies by your side, you can relax and enjoy the journey, knowing that in the end, you'll be thrilled with the outcome. Cheers to homes and places that fill our hearts!

ownerResponse.text: Congrats Brenda! And thank you for the wonderful testimonial about Mira and Lee.

google_reviews.author: Don Reville
google_reviews.review:
I truly cannot say enough good things about my selling experience with Mira and Lee.

Either one of these amazing individuals would be MORE than enough to capably handle the sale of my home.  The fact that you get them BOTH when needed has immeasurable value!  To say I am a "high maintenance"  client would be a bit of an understatement.  Mira and Lee made me feel like I was their only client with timely and professional service at every step of the sale process.

I was going through a stressful relocation to Chicagoland and am very thankful for Lee and Mira's expert and professional guidance on all matters made the entire process go smoothly.  Their approach to the sale of my home brought the best of meaningful market analysis and artistic creativity to allow my home to sell for its full potential thus allowing me to maximize my equity!

My wife and I will be back to Bellingham in the future, when the time comes there is only ONE team that we will enlisting the help of ... MIRA AND LEE.

ownerResponse.text: This is such a wonderful testimonial and thank you so much for the review! Congrats on your home sale Don!

google_reviews.author: Brian Strutzel
google_reviews.review: As a first time home buyer I was terrified of the entire process but finding a real estate agent that I could trust had my family's best interest in mind was my biggest concern.  However I got everything I could ask for and then some in a real estate agent when I chose to go with William Elmer, he was always in contact, he would answer every question I had to help me be informed and not overwhelmed with everything, and most importantly he never made me feel pressured to make a decision and allowed the whole process to take its course organically. I know this was only my first home purchase but I can tell you that with me William has earned a customer for life. He truly provides the type of service where you feel like a friend instead of a client.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for this amazing review about William. And congrats on becoming a homeowner Brian!

google_reviews.author: Courtney Pohl
google_reviews.review: Paul and Travis at John L. Scott in Bellingham are a fantastic real estate team!  They helped my husband and I navigate the home buying process from out of state.  Their extensive knowledge of the local market helped us find the perfect home.  We were buying the home in a trust which made the process a little more complicated, and they handled it very well and we still closed on time!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Courtney for the good word about Travis Boyd and Paul Balzotti. Congrats on your investment purchase as well!

google_reviews.author: Else Jones
google_reviews.review: We really struck gold when we ended up with Mira as our realtor for our first house. From the start she proved she had our best interests in mind by sitting us down to explain the house buying process and really preparing us. Mira dedicated time and energy to us that we only could have dreamed of. Our house buying process was rockier than most and being the all star that she is Mira handled it like a champ. She will go to bat for you, she will protect you, and she will listen and comfort you when the process gets to be a little too much. My partner and I have already said we will be using Mira for any buying/selling in the future because we love her so much!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Else, thank you for the amazing testimonial about Mira...She is indeed fabulous! Congrats on your new home purchase as well!

google_reviews.author: Robert DeVaux
google_reviews.review: Mira Gregory is a very professional and highly competent real estate practitioner. Weve used her to buy our house and used her to sell that house.  Her marketing plan and strategy was successful and the sell went perfectly.  She educated us on her proposed  strategy but was open to our input.  She communicated openly throughout the process being fully transparent making us feel confident that we were fully informed every step of the way.  She went above and beyond on many occasions and did many favors for us even post transaction.  If you was a trustworthy, transparent professional to represent your real estate needs, Mira is the best Ive ever worked with.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the review Robert!

google_reviews.author: Lena Burgin
google_reviews.review:
Mira and Lee are exceptional. We have a unique situation- we are living in California, moving to Louisiana and selling our home in Washington. I dont even know how this all would have been logistically possible without them.

They have an army of people from handymen, to inspectors to interior designers/stagers. And quite frankly, just get. It. Done.

Their communication is beyond acceptable and above all, just really good people.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Lena, thank you for the wonderful review of Mira and Lee! This is a fabulous testimonial and we really appreciate it!

google_reviews.author: Scott Packer
google_reviews.review:
This is a review for Mira Gregory. She recently sold our condo.

I've worked with a lot of realtors over the years. Mira is simply the best one. She had her finger on the pulse of the local market. She communicated regularly with us keeping us informed. She also helped arrange for work to be done on the property. She is simply the best.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Scott!

google_reviews.author: Valerie Goetz
google_reviews.review: Buying a home can be intimidating, but Mira helped us over every hurdle and through each step of the process.  She is so very friendly, encouraging and knowledgeable of all areas of real estate practices and local area information.  Her attention to detail was very impressive and with her positive and upbeat energy, she didn't give up until she found just the right house for us.  Communication is a huge key to a great buyer-agent relationship and Mira is always just a quick phone call away, no matter the situation.  We really felt like a well-running team with Mira from start to finish.  We honestly don't know what we would have done without Ms. Gregory and we very highly recommend her services!  Excellent and professional, responsive and caring.  All the things you want in a Realtor.  This is Mira Gregory!!!!  Thank you, Mira!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Valerie, thank you so much for the good word, and recommendation of Mira Gregory. Congrats on your purchase as well!

google_reviews.author: Crissy Impero
google_reviews.review: I researched all the local firms prior to finishing my real estate courses and interviewed with a few. As soon as I walked thru the door of the Bellingham John L Scott I knew I was home. Such warm and friendly brokers who bring such value to each transaction, owner Paul puts us all first and is continually helping us up our skills. Darin, the managing broker, is always there for us with answers and out transaction coordinator Molly and office manager Linda are second to none. I love the teamwork and always say that when you hire one of us you really get all of us!

ownerResponse.text: We love working with you Crissy --you are an outstanding broker and person. Thank you for sharing the good word!

google_reviews.author: William Elmer
google_reviews.review: I recently joined the this office and it is everything I could want out of a local real estate brokerage. From the high level of professionalism and polish, the immense depth of knowledge and experience from the managing brokers, and the incredibly welcoming and fun atmosphere from all my colleagues, there is absolutely no where else Id rather hang my license.

google_reviews.author: Brittany Rose
google_reviews.review: Mira was the absolute best realtor to guide me through the process of purchasing my first home. She was quick to respond when I had questions or concerns. I highly recommend her to anyone that needs a trusting realtor. Buying my first home came with typical worries, but Mira was there every step of the way to explain anything that I questioned. If I plan to sell in the future, Mira will be the only realtor I would trust to assure things go smoothly. Mira comes with the highest recommendation, I assure she will have your best interest in mind as she did with mine!

ownerResponse.text: Brittany, congrats on your home purchase! And thank you so much for the glowing review about Mira!

google_reviews.author: Taylor Rebekah
google_reviews.review: My first time buying a home and Mira was awesome! I was very scared / stressed the entire time, she probably handled WAY more things out side her job requires her to do, and then some. If there was something mentally I couldn't handle to do she'd help me accomplish it the best she could.  She is very fast at responding. She's not pushy like I know other real estate agents can be, she's not that in anyway. She's very laid back, not in your face, but still super nice and professional! 10/10 Recommend.

ownerResponse.text: Congrats on becoming a homeowner Taylor! It is indeed a stressful process and we are thrilled that things worked out. We very much appreciate you sharing the positive review about Mira.

google_reviews.author: Joanna Powell Colbert
google_reviews.review: I'm very glad Mira Gregory was my agent when I was buying my home. She is professional, efficient, and a pleasure to work with. She answered all my questions and always responded promptly to my messages. She helped me make informed decisions, and recommended great people to work with too. I felt very well taken care of. Highly recommended!

ownerResponse.text: We appreciate the wonderful review Joanna!

google_reviews.author: Dayna Del Mar
google_reviews.review:
We worked with Brianna Robbins and she was amazing to work with! Wed connected with her via our friends who run a local Forest School, so we knew she was going to understand us and our values and interests well.

Before we even moved to Bellingham, she made time to connect with us over a call and we kept in touch for several months before we lived here. It felt like we were already friends before Bellingham became our home! We chose to move into a rental and begin getting to know the city well, before purchasing, and she even helped point us in the right direction to find a great rental.

Brianna started showing homes for us even though we weren't planning on purchasing in Bellingham until Spring 2023. Through her, we got a feel for Bellingham's neighborhoods and the market here. When we happened upon a house with the potential to be our family's forever home, Brianna was on it. We got our forever home and property for under asking, and Brianna's recommendation to use Umpqua Bank got us in with a great local lender we otherwise might not have discovered. I cannot overstate how good she was during the negotiation phase; she ensured we got a fair price from sellers who were holding out hope that the former market would return.

Throughout our journey, Brianna was helpful, timely, and knowledgeable about the quirks and considerations of the houses we toured. She tried different options based on our guidelines, paid close attention to our feedback, and never suggested a house similar to one we previously disliked. Even though we were an uncertain bet, we never felt like a lower priority. If you are new to town and want to thoroughly understand the area without feeling pressure to just bid on houses, Brianna is a great choice.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for this amazing testimonial about your experience working with Brianna and congrats on your new home!

google_reviews.author: G Martin
google_reviews.review: Mira provided superb representation during our recent purchase of a home in Sudden Valley. Her assistance began 8 months earlier, helping my wife during a trip to Washington to scout possible relocation areas in the PNW. We were living in Maryland at the time. We were planning on moving West during the summer. For the next several months Mira provided several candidate listings and suggestions on which communities would fit our lifestyle. When we arrived in July, we shifted to an intense house hunting effort and Mira easily stepped up to our needs. Within a week we submitted our first offer, it was rejected, and then we quickly pivoted to another, even better home to submit a second offer. Mira expertly guided through the process. We ended up beating a competing offer, mostly because of Mira's knowledge of the seller's needs. She made a great recommendation for a home inspector.  We closed in less than 30 days. And she has continued to check up on us. Hands down the best buyers rep we have had!

google_reviews.author: Mac Pickens
google_reviews.review: Mira has been an absolute joy to work with, from start to finish, and my husband and I feel so lucky to have connected with her in our home search, as we have come out of the transaction not only with a gorgeous new home, but with a new friend in the process. As we were looking for homes from out of state, we sought an agent with great communication skills, strong business acumen and knowledge about the community we were looking to relocate within, and Mira went above and beyond to deliver on all fronts. Since we werent able to view homes in person, Mira curated detailed video walk-throughs of multiple listings for us and put together comprehensive information about the properties to assist us in our search. When we found the one, our forever home, Mira was a fierce advocate for us; through two time zones and 2,300 miles of physical distance, Mira built relationships with both of us and has gone out of her way to make our entire family feel welcomed and settled in our new dream home in the Pacific Northwest! From a very happy new homeowner, I highly recommend Mira for your realtor needs; she is a gem to work with and an absolute asset to anyone in the real estate market.

google_reviews.author: Bernie Saks
google_reviews.review: Peter Roberts is the best realtor. He is knowledgeable fair and to the point. He has always given me great advice and facilitated easy real estate transactions whether I have been the buyer or seller

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Bernie! Peter is an outstanding broker and we appreciate your endorsement!

google_reviews.author: Barb Demorest
google_reviews.review: Mira Gregory patiently helped us over 2 years on our quest for just the right place for our next season of life. She was always there for us even on a rainy night to view a place quickly. She worked with us to purchase a highly sought after home and accommodated a uniquely structured deal. She helped us get our "ducks in a row" to be more likely to be successful in our purchase. Every time we apologized for putting her out she always responded with, "it's my pleasure".  Mira has the utmost integrity and knowledge and we highly recommend her for your real estate purchase and/or sale.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with Mira! What a great testimonial of her professionalism and service. Congrats to you on your new home Barb!

google_reviews.author: Emily Carraux
google_reviews.review: Mira Gregory has been absolutely the best realtor we could have asked for! She went above and beyond to support us through the entire process of searching for the perfect home and then navigating the stressful purchasing process. She was always available, extremely knowledgeable, and worked so hard for us going above and beyond what we had expected. Anyone would be lucky to have Mira representing them!

google_reviews.author: Tom Dorn
google_reviews.review: Mira Gregory is more than a real estate agent.  She is gracious, very professional, and respectful, not only toward us as buyers but all parties involved in our pursuit.  Mira is! very knowledgeable about Bellingham, the market, lifestyles, neighborhoods, and trends.  Rather than push, she guides.  She draws out her clients' preferences and presents the best options, then defers.  Mira does not miss a beat, responding quickly never delaying an answer.  Our quest was tricky, we came from out of state and were looking for our retirement home.  Our experience being represented by Mira was excellent!   Thank you Mira! The Dorns

google_reviews.author: Michael Hodel
google_reviews.review: Marsha Brown was a fantastic real estate agent during my recent home purchase.  She was super responsive, experienced, very detail oriented, data driven, and even suggested creative ideas to increase our offer's chance of success.  Marsha is very well-connected and helped us find a local lender, title company, and even an inspector to get the deal done smoothly.  On top of that she is smart, funny, and probably the nicest person I've met in Bellingham.  We'll be working with Marsha for all our real estate needs in the future.  Total pro.  Highly recommend.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Michael for the great testimonial about Marsha! We appreciate it, and agree with all of your notes about Marsha. Also, congrats on your new home!

google_reviews.author: Mary McDougall
google_reviews.review: Kerri Zender was a pleasure to work with in buying our new home in Bellingham.  She was knowledgeable, friendly, and responsive to all of our questions and concerns.  As a lifelong local resident, her familiarity with the town, neighborhoods, and services has been invaluable to us.  We would highly recommend Kerri to anyone looking to buy or sell a home.

ownerResponse.text: HI Mary, congratulations on your new home! And thank you for the positive review about Kerri!

google_reviews.author: Two_Wheel_ Feels
google_reviews.review: Patient, pleasant and professional. Working with the John L Scott team and Vanessa Treadway made my home shopping experience a breeze.  Vanessa was an extremely knowledgeable resource for someone new to the area. She went above and beyond to help me find exactly what I was looking for in a home and property for my family. Highly recommend!

ownerResponse.text: Vanessa is a total pro and we really appreciate your for the testimonial!

google_reviews.author: Kelli Hagin
google_reviews.review:
I worked with an agent named Sarah Aguirre and she was fantastic!

Sarah always took the time to listen carefully to my needs and clearly communicated with me through the whole process. If I had questions, she always took the time to make sure I had the correct information and returned my calls quickly.

If you are looking for an agent and an agency that is going to work hard for you, Sarah and John L Scott are the people you need in your corner. Sarah is thoughtful, professional, courteous, and ambitious. With the best agency in the business behind her, you cannot lose. Call Sarah for all of your real estate needs!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the great review Kelli! Sarah is an amazing person and Realtor, and so happy you had a positive experience with her.

google_reviews.author: Theresa Butcher
google_reviews.review: Im a big fan of John L. Scott in Bellingham. The office and the staff have a fresh modern vibe, but they are part of a bigger company that has been around for decades so you know youre getting the infrastructure and accountability you want on your side when making such a big purchase. I worked with Nathan Butcher (an agent at John L Scott, Bellingham) and I couldnt be happier. I have a decent bias, seeing as Nathan is my husband, but after buying a house with him as our agent, I can officially and objectively 1000% recommend him to anyone I know, love, or havent even met yet ;) Nathan is fun, professional, leads with integrity, and is backed by a brokerage (JLS) that is chock-full of resources that help make the process smooth. He is very knowledgeable about the area, the process, negotiating, and how to structure a contract that can win in this nutty market! Nathan communicated the process so well and I felt like I had all the information I needed throughout the transaction. Without him as our agent, theres no way we would be in our house today!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Theresa. Nathan Butcher is a top notch broker too!

google_reviews.author: Taylor Garrod
google_reviews.review:
Jennifer Hebert at John L. Scott helped me buy my first home and I could not be happier! After viewing a property I wanted to pursue, Jenn helped me get pre-approved for a home loan AND got my offer accepted in a competitive offer situation where my offer was accepted over several other offers. And all of that happened within about a day!

Her knowledge of the home loan process, the competitive market and her relationships within the industry were especially valuable. Jennifer has continued to be available after the close of my purchase to help me line up services including an electrician and a roofer for my planned home improvements and repairs.

Beyond that, she was incredibly fun to work with and always super friendly and professional. While I know I want to stay in my wonderful new home for years to come, I know that Jennifer will be my first call if ever need help again.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Taylor! You said it right, Jennifer is both outstanding at her job and fun! We appreciate the review.

google_reviews.author: Charlotte Gazak
google_reviews.review:
I was working  with Marsha Brown, who works with JL Scott. She is a wonderful agent who cares a lot about her clients, she made things so easy, and dealt
so patiently with my anxiety. She managed to have the closing of both properties on the same day, and that saved me a lot of money because I didnt need a bridge loan. I recommend her highly! It turned out to be a great experience.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Charlotte for the wonderful review of your experience with Marsha. That is one of the things we specialize in is helping people make that sell/buy move, which can be tricky sometimes. Congrats on your home sale and new home purchase!

google_reviews.author: Amy Siemens
google_reviews.review: I worked with Jessica Vanoy. She was so helpful and so quick to answer questions or reassure us. She is kind and down to earth. She helped us find our perfect new home.  She had said we will take as long as needed until we find the right one. She made sure we had the best and most competitive offer when we were ready. I would highly recommend Jessica to anyone buying a new house.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Amy, Congrats on your home purchase, and thank you so much for the wonderful review about working with Jessica!

google_reviews.author: Vicki Buffer
google_reviews.review: My daughter and I recently worked with Allison Kennedy of John L Scott Bellingham in purchasing our new home together.  Allison was amazing to work with.  She was very professional, caring, helpful and always there every step of the way during our home purchase. I would highly recommend Allison to anyone looking for a super helpful and caring realtor!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the review about Alison! Congrats on your new home, and we are thrilled you had a great experience with your purchase.

google_reviews.author: Karin Baylor
google_reviews.review: We are over the moon happy with our experience with John L Scott Real Estate and specifically with our wonderful agent, Molly Visser, in the sale of our home. Molly listened attentively and really empathized with our needs, had lots of great knowledge and creative suggestions for getting our home ready for the market. The John L Scott team really got the word out in advertising our listing, and we had not 1 but 2 offers within just 3 days! Molly was super communicative and available for all our questions and eased all our anxieties about the process. She genuinely shared in our excitement as we accepted an offer and accelerated closing. It was such a smooth process that we had been super stressed out about. I strongly encourage anyone thinking about selling their home to reach out to Molly!

ownerResponse.text: This is awesome! We are thrilled you had an awesome experience with Molly. She is an incredible Realtor, and a genuine person who cares deeply about her clients. Molly's  personality is positive and enthusiastic, so this testimonial matches her perfectly. Thank you so much for the review and congrats on your home sale!

google_reviews.author: Joyce Lawrence
google_reviews.review: Just purchased a home with the help of Marsha Brown, who is such a patient and knowledgeable realtor. She listened closely to our needs, was extremely responsive, and guided us through the whole process. Highly recommend working with her. She knows Bellingham so well and really cares about finding you a home that you love at the right price.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Joyce, thank you so much for the review about Marsha, and congrats on your home purchase!

google_reviews.author: valerie h
google_reviews.review: Jessica VanNoy is one of the most professional yet kindest people I have ever worked with. In a decade of working with her I always knew I could count on her for anything regardless of what it was, even when it was a personal issue rather than work related. Even though we both left our original areas, she has remained One of the people I can always reach out to with a question, a concern or just to get a quick pick me up. For a caring, considerate, and all around go-getter who will have your best interests at heart, you couldnt do better than to work with Jessica to help find your new home and enjoy the process.

ownerResponse.text: Valerie, thank you for the wonderful review of Jessica. We agree she is an amazing and genuinely caring person, as you have noted! We are proud to have Jessica representing our firm

google_reviews.author: Laura Newgard
google_reviews.review: Heather Stevenson is absolutely, hands down, my most loved agent. Her level of communication, transparency, knowledge and dedication to her clients is well above the standards in the area. Her knowledge of the market as well as connections to incredible lenders is what sets her apart from the rest. There is no worry when I am working with her. She makes the process low stress and so enjoyable.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Laura, Thank you so much for the wonderful review about Heather!

google_reviews.author: Grant Scarlett
google_reviews.review: I worked with Jessica VanNoy as my agent through John L. Scott and she was very responsive and engaging. She always had our best interests in mind and helped us get our first place! I am very happy with the service provided. If Im ever buying another house or property, Ill be sure to come back here again. 5/5 stars.

ownerResponse.text: That is great to hear Grant, and thank you for the good word about Jessica!

google_reviews.author: traci johnson
google_reviews.review: We have worked with Molly on four different occasions...clearly she is fantastic to work with which is why we continue to call on her as the opportunity arises. We know that she is on it and always working for us. She always responds quickly to any communication and is thorough and efficient in any questions or concerns we have. She advocates for her clients and is such a genuine, kind and caring person. We can't say enough great things about Molly and highly recommend her for everyone we can!

ownerResponse.text: We really appreciate the amazing review! Molly is an outstanding agent and we are so proud to have her as part of our team. Thank you Traci for taking the time to share your experience with Molly and our brokerage.

google_reviews.author: morgan libby
google_reviews.review: Heather Stevenson  was a dream agent. She walked me through the entire step of the way and made me feel confident about the process. I appreciated her knowledge and the way she alleviated my anxiety. She is incredibly detailed and that detail helped me save money and we were able to put together a deal quickly as the market was very dynamic at the time. She was very responsive and available. I can not recommend her enough

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Morgan! Heather is incredibly detail oriented, and absolutely a first class person and Realtor. We appreciate the fantastic review!

google_reviews.author: Dayton Sanchez
google_reviews.review: Sarah Aguirre is one of my most favorable , hands down fantastic, wonderful realtor. The most family oriented realtor I have ever met! Outstanding performance. She is #1 at John L. Scott! You won't be disappointed, I am very picky with my realtors but I was very pleased with her performance! 100%!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Dayton! We agree, and thank you for sharing your wonderful experience working with her!

google_reviews.author: Joey Dotolo
google_reviews.review: Heather  has been fantastic about showing us around Bellingham - her knowledge and expertise in the area has been incredibly helpful in finding the right home for me and my family.  Working with Heather was a delight!  her system was well organized and she communicated clearly throughout the whole process - I always knew what to expect.  I would absolutely recommend Heather Stevenson to anyone looking to sell or buy a home.

ownerResponse.text: We really appreciate the good word about your experience with Heather! She is an outstanding broker and we are proud to have her as part of our team. Thank you again for the review!

google_reviews.author: Parker Worthington
google_reviews.review: We had a fantastic experience working with Paul Balzotti to purchase our first home in Bellingham. Paul was referred by a trusted source, and came through for us in a very competitve market. He has the right temperament as a realtor, and was very honest and straight forward through the process. I will be working with Paul in the future, and would recommend him to others.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the review Parker!

google_reviews.author: Carolyn Phillips
google_reviews.review: Mira was a great agent. She was very knowledgable about the Bellingham area and was able to help us get the best price for our property in a changing market. We would definitely recommend her.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Carolyn,  Congrats on your sale, and thank you so much for the wonderful review about Mira Gregory!

google_reviews.author: Michele Siemion
google_reviews.review:
I worked with Molly Visser at John L Scott last summer buying and selling a home in Bellingham, WA.  The market here is crazy, with homes moving within days!!! Molly was fearless, she was on the phone with me daily helping navigate the offer on my new home and put my place on the market within two weeks.  I wouldnt have attempted it without her guidance and support.  Molly was kind and tough - a rare and valuable combination.  She maintained a sense of humor when I was nervous, and provided sound advice when the sale of my home became complicated due to property line issues (common in Whatcom county).
I have NO reservations recommended Molly as a real estate agent, she knows the local market and has the support behind her of a reputable firm.
Thank you Molly!!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the review Michele! That sounds like the Molly we know and love, and we appreciate the testimonial!

google_reviews.author: Stacy Meissner
google_reviews.review: Our family had some complex and changing housing requirements.  We were very satisfied working with Molly Visser.  She always took the time to explain our options, the pros and cons, and documented what each would mean from a cost perspective.  She really guided our search based on listening to our needs.  Molly made herself available literally at all times, even for the 9pm panic attack talk-downs... The John L Scott App was helpful.  We had multiple search filters set up to easily weed out houses that would not work for us.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Stacy, we really appreciate the fantastic review about Molly! Also love that you were able to take advantage of our app as well. Thank you!

google_reviews.author: B H
google_reviews.review: What an incredible experience I had purchasing a home with Tracy Peterson-Nienaber's help.  She is a wealth of information on the area, her recommendations are solid and she's a joy to be around.  Tracy's knowledge of the buying process is exceptional and she provided a great listening ear at decision time.  She was there when I texted, emailed or called and made herself available when needed.  Tracy is friendly, open to new ideas, provides sound advice and is a bundle of energy...all just waiting to help you, too!  Don't hesitate - call Tracy...she's the BEST!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the wonderful review! Tracy is indeed an outstanding broker.

google_reviews.author: Kellie Strong
google_reviews.review:
John L. Scott Bellingham is owned by Paul Balzotti. I have worked with with them for the past 3 years of my 20 year career. Paul and his team are amazing! Through their ongoing training and the constant support, they provide an endless pipeline filled up with all the needed Market Knowledge, Contracts/Laws Training, Technology Training, Amazing Software/Programs for their Brokers all the while helping you to stay very active and visible in the community! Beyond all this 'industry brilliance' that Paul provides, he always has an amazing Team and they, become 'Your Team' and all the Brokers he has made room for in that office, become 'Your People.'
Whether you are looking to hire a Broker, or you are looking to hang your license; You'd be crazy not to ask to come here!!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much Kellie for the testimonial!

google_reviews.author: Anne
google_reviews.review:
Agent: someone or something that makes something happen.

Tracy Peterson-Nienaber, a John L. Scott broker/agent, is not only a friend, shes also an excellent and extremely effective agent who takes seriously and truly lives up to her title. Her knowledge and sincerity are just a few of her many assets.

Tracy assisted us when we bought our house and I have happily recommended her to other friends and acquaintances and will continue to do so.

That she has decided to bring her talent to John L Scott is a credit to them.

ownerResponse.text: Tracy is an amazing broker, and we were thrilled to have her as part of the JLS family. Your testimonial means a lot. Thank you!

google_reviews.author: Pamela Shaffer
google_reviews.review:
I have enjoyed working with Oksana over the past few years.  She is willing to go the extra mile and has a pleasant and uplifting attitude.  She is knowledgeable in her field and enthusiastic with most everything she does.   Working with her has been a pleasure.  I very much appreciate her respectful attitude and excellent work ethics and most of all, she clearly enjoys helping others succeed with their goals.
Pamela Shaffer.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Pamela for the fabulous review of Oksana! We really appreciate it!

google_reviews.author: Julie Ann Smith
google_reviews.review: Jessica is amazing! She goes above and beyond to ensure that her clients needs are met. She truly has their best interests at heart. Her work ethic and integrity speak volumes of her caring and genuine nature. I highly recommend her to anyone!

ownerResponse.text: We agree and thank you! Jessica is such a caring person and we appreciate the testimonial!

google_reviews.author: Margaret Sun
google_reviews.review: Patrick Britton represented us in a recent transaction. He was very responsible and professional. He has great knowledge about the real estate market in the area and was very pleasant to work with. I felt that as our agent, he had our best interest in mind and I took his advice on all decisions that we had to make regarding the transaction.

ownerResponse.text: Margaret, thank you for taking the time to review Patrick. We agree he is an amazing broker!

google_reviews.author: Teresa Sutphin
google_reviews.review: I trust Jessica VanNoy with all my real estate needs. I have known Jessica for 20+ years. She is smart, hard-working, professional,  responsive and  is a people person.  Finding all of those traits in one real estate agent is everything that a home buyer or home seller what desire.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Teresa, Thank you for the amazing testimonial about Jessica!

google_reviews.author: Dana Pound
google_reviews.review: Molly Visser never hesitated to bend over backwards to help us find the perfect property to fit our very unique needs. She even took us out to look at houses after a huge snow event that had all the schools and many businesses closed down (never mind that she got stuck trying to get out of her own driveway on her way to get us...but she persevered!!!). We are now SO very happy in our new "forever" home and have a lot to be grateful for in Molly!

ownerResponse.text: We appreciate this amazing review Dana!  We love that Molly was there for you in all weather conditions! Awesome testimonial and congrats on your new home.

google_reviews.author: Kayla McIntyre
google_reviews.review: Sarah is a wonderful addition to your team. She is always ready and able to help me in whatever way I need. Super responsive and professional, her work ethic speaks volumes.  Thank you for always offering me sound advice when thinking about purchasing a home, Sarah!!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Kayla, thank you for the positive review about Sarah! Good luck on your search as well.

google_reviews.author: ken cantrell
google_reviews.review: Extremely hard working, goes the extra mile, and then some.  Very engaging personality, real, down to earth.  When she says her clients are important, you actually believe her. Tireless in her commitment to search and find the perfect home for her clients.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Ken, thank you for the endorsement of Mira Gregory! We agree on all accounts, and appreciate the review.

google_reviews.author: Robert Freeborn
google_reviews.review: I loved working with Patrick Britton. Not only is he pleasant to work with, but he is an amazing expert on the area.  When investing in Real Estate, it is essential that you have accurate valuations so you can run your numbers. Pat's comps are right on, and he takes care to be accurate and precise.  I plan to not only list, but purchase all my properties through and with Pat.

google_reviews.author: N V
google_reviews.review: There is no other than Mira!!!  She came to me highly recommended for the sale of the home and was every bit of the professional, diligent, communicative, and efficient person I was told to expect.   But there is more....Mira went above and beyond my expectations with a level of attention and care to detail on every aspect of the selling process.  There is no other!!!

ownerResponse.text: This is such a fantastic endorsement of Mira! Thank you so much, and we are thrilled you had such a great experience working with her!

google_reviews.author: Michelle Lewis
google_reviews.review: Alison is someone I have known for years, and I completely trust her judgement. My friend Joyce bought a home through John L. Scott as her realtor and gave rave reviews over the service she gave. Currently I am in search of a home and the only agent I would choose is Alison!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the review about Alison Kennedy! Alison is an excellent broker, and has a heart of gold -and we are grateful to have her as part of our team. Your in good hands and best of luck on your home search!

google_reviews.author: Hannah Jones (Hannah's Homes)
google_reviews.review: I have love working here from the moment I walked in! Each broker is supportive, educated about the current market, and wanting to give their clients the absolute best experience in their real estate transactions. I highly recommend John L Scott for any of your real estate transactions.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for Hannah! You are an amazing broker, and we are grateful you chose John L Scott Bellingham!

google_reviews.author: Katy Hagin
google_reviews.review: Sarah Aguirre attentively walked me through the process of what it would be like buying a home as a first time buyer. I never thought I would be able to afford a home, but Sarah educated me on credit, down payments, and loans to help make my dream a reality. Very professional and full of good advice!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Katy, that is an amazing review, and thank you so much for sharing your  experience with Sarah. Also, congrats on becoming a homeowner!

google_reviews.author: Linda Kidwell
google_reviews.review: Jessica VanNoy was so helpful in getting our home ready to sell and " show". She is from Bellingham so her knowing a Lot of people was very advantageous thru out the entire process. Jessica is honest and takes pride in helping you . Our home received its first offer after the 8th showing. Our information fliers/ pics were the best! We've moved a Lot and this was the quickest and best experience. Thank you Jessica and John L Scott

ownerResponse.text: Linda, thank you for sharing a 5 star rating!

google_reviews.author: Linda Pettigrew
google_reviews.review:
It was great! I felt like Hannah (Cranny) had my back through the whole process. She is absolutely delightful, thoughtful and extremely intelligent when it comes to the details. She outshines every other realtor I've worked with!

Linda Pettigrew

ownerResponse.text: Hi Linda, thank you so much for the testimonial about Hannah. Hannah is amazing, and we are thrilled to hear you had such a great experience. Congrats on your move!

google_reviews.author: joseph wystup
google_reviews.review: This is hands down the best real estate office in whatcom county. I was so impressed with this office and their listing broker, Peter Robert's when I bought my house from them. Fast forward 3 years later, I got my real estate license and decided to work there. Yes that's right. I went from being a client in one of their transactions, to being a Realtor there. You cannot go wrong with JOHN L. SCOTT  BELLINGHAM.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Joe! We love having you as part of the JLS family!

google_reviews.author: Wyatt Jarvis
google_reviews.review: As first time home buyers we are grateful that our realtor, Joe Wystup, was extremely accommodating and energetic throughout the process of buying this house. I have a big personality, and we liked that Joe was always willing to meet us where we were, make sure we understood everything that was happening, and the best part was that he was an amazing collaborator. We agreed on a strategy, modified as needed, and we were a team. Joe even shoveled snow to help us get out of our driveway one day. The seller was new to the game of building and selling houses. Without Joe's patience and tenacity this deal would have fallen through 8 times over. As a plus, he is the kind of dude that always seems to know a guy who knows how to do something you might need. We call him the JoeLodex behind his back. Joe is also an accomplished opera singer so you will always know whether the house you want has ideal accoustics.

ownerResponse.text: Wyatt, we appreciate the great review of Joe! He is such a great guy who is extremely dedicated and resourceful, as you noted! We are thrilled you had such a positive experience.

google_reviews.author: Chauvin Rupley
google_reviews.review: My family and I worked solely with Patrick Britton from John L Scott on our home purchase in Bellingham and we truly could not have closed on a better deal without him. I outlined exactly what we were looking for and what fit our budget --- more importantly the timeline in which we needed. Patrick was professional, timely in his responses, and always answered any questions we had. As you can imagine, buying a home can be overwhelming and the list of questions can pile up but he took care of all our concerns and made the process less stressful than I imagined. Patrick is innovative in his approach to find the home for you. To illustrate to you what I mean, the budget and style of home we wanted was high in demand and nearly impossible to get an offer on. Each listing that popped up would be pending shortly thereafter. Patrick found ways to get us into what we needed by prior referrals and off market listings and that is exactly how we got our home: off-market and no bidding wars to delay our move. If a knowledgeable agent with impressive networking capabilities is what you're looking for, look no further. Patrick Britton will work hard for you and your family and get you in a home you love.

ownerResponse.text: Patrick is an exceptional Realtor and we appreciate the positive review!

google_reviews.author: Jennifer Hebert
google_reviews.review: You cannot go wrong with these agents to buy or sell your next property! The team at JLS Bellingham are highly trained professionals with up-to-the minute insights on what is happening in the local market. Luxury properties...investment...buying your first home...Look no further!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Jennifer! You are a fantastic loan officer, and our team loves working with you!

google_reviews.author: Ryver Wyse
google_reviews.review: Working with Jeff Willson is such a pleasant experience!  His calmness and optimism about the real estate process is refreshing, as well as the clarity and solid communication that he exudes.  Just what you want in a good Realtor: quality listening and and active success!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Ryver, thank you for the wonderful review of Jeff, we like to call "the Zen Realtor"!  We appreciate the testimonial and congratulations to you!

google_reviews.author: Theresa Stanley
google_reviews.review:
We just had to let you know that working with John L Scott and our realtor, Alison Kennedy, has been a true pleasure. She really heard our needs and put the client first. Her personality and ability to hear what we were really saying made what could have been a stressful time, truly exciting and fun experience! If you are looking for an agent that puts you first then Alison is your gal.
~Bill and Theresa Stanley

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the review! Alison is an outstanding broker and wonderful person, and we are thrilled that you had a great experience with Alison and our brokerage.

google_reviews.author: kayla
google_reviews.review: Amazing real estate agent! Jennifer Hebert was knowledgeable, kind, and more than willing to help! Being a first-time home buyer she helped me understand every step of the process in its entirety so I was not confused or ill-informed when decisions came around. Jenn made this process #easybreezy!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for positive review about Jennifer! She is a rising star and we agree with all of the above!

google_reviews.review: Jessica VanNoy is one of the nicest, genuine, hardworking and compassionate people I know. She is dedicated to her clients and friends and takes every opportunity to help others. I think everyone knows and would agree, Jessica is the type of person you can count on.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Elaine, thank you for the wonderful review about Jessica!

google_reviews.review: We worked with Jessica Vanoy and had a great experience. She was very well informed and on top of new properties. Jessica worked with us to ensure our wants and needs were met. A+

google_reviews.author: Susan Royal
google_reviews.review: Working with Jeff Willson was our 'calm in the storm' of our home buying process. In this frenzied/chaotic/high pressure/discouraging market, Jeff was able to steer us to appropriate properties in a relaxed but focused manner. He took time to listen and understand our vision, responded quickly to any question, and guided us thru each step of our accelerated(10 day) closing.  Would recommend him to anyone. Susan J.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the wonderful review about Jeff, and congrats to you on your new home!

google_reviews.review: We worked with Eric Green from the Bellingham John L. Scott office.  Eric was a pleasure to work with!  He is knowledgeable, professional, and was focused on taking care of us through our home sale.  We are very happy with the outcome and would highly recommend Eric.
